ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The rapid fire causes Phobias ship to shake. The shields were weakest behind the ship but against K9 s weapon they d hold long enough. The ship lowered itself

The rapid fire causes Phobias ship to shake. The shields were weakest 
behind the ship but against K9's weapon they'd hold long enough. The 
ship lowered itself to the ground guns facing away from K9, the 
shields powered down to 20 percent. Phobia was running a risk getting 
this close and he knew it. 

Phobia opened a link to the Maximal "I do not wish to fight you, My 
back is to you and I've decreased power to my shields, I'm at your 
mercy. As a sign of interest transform to beast mode and we'll 
negotiate. by the way my weapons were only set at 10 percent."

If this bot had any sense of logic it would see the disadvantage it 
was in and react accordingly.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod continued to fire, on the CFs attackers.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 saw what phobia was trying to do.
> "No! There trying to cut me off from the other Maximals. Cant let 
them!"
> he switches his riflr to rapid fire, and shoots at the ship.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit felt the base shake, from the attack.
> "Glad to have you back, to normal." He said, to KitKat.
> He kissed her, putting feeling into it.
